title: Organizations
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : Organizations**

**International Organizations**  
 [Alphabetties](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Alphabetties)  
 [Association Typographique Internationale](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ATypI) (ATypI)  
 [Society of Typographic Aficionados](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/SoTA) (SOTA)  
 [Type Directors Club](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Type%20Directors%20Club) (TDC)  
 [International Society of Typographic Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ISTD) (ISTD)( [istd.org.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/www.istd.org.uk/))  
 [Typophile](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typophile) ( [Typophile.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/www.typophile.com/))  
 [Icograda](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Icograda)  
 [TypeTalks](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/TypeTalks) ( [http://typetalks.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typetalks.com/))

**[American Organizations](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/United%20States)**  
 [American Printing History Association](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/APHA) (APHA)  
 [The Typophiles](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/The%20Typophiles)  
 [American Institute of Graphic Arts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/American%20Institute%20of%20Graphic%20Arts) (AIGA)  
 [Society of Typographic Arts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Society%20of%20Typographic%20Arts) (STA)  
 [Western New York Book Arts Collaborative](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Western%20New%20York%20Book%20Arts%20Collaborative) (WNYBAC)

**[Austrian Organizations](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Australia)**  
 [Typographische Gesellschaft Austria](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typographische%20Gesellschaft%20Austria) (tga)

**[Canadian Organizations](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Canada)**  
 [Type Club of Toronto](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Type%20Club%20of%20Toronto)

**[British Organisations](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/United%20Kingdom)**  
 [The Typographic Circle](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/The%20Typographic%20Circle)  
 [Friends of St Bride Printing Library](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Friends%20of%20St%20Bride%20Printing%20Library)  
 [Printing Historical Society](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Printing%20Historical%20Society) (PHS)

**[German Organizations](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Germany)**  
 [Schreibwerkstatt Offenbach](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Schreibwerkstatt%20Offenbach)  
 [Forum Typografie](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Forum%20Typografie)  
 [Typografische Gesellschaft München](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typografische%20Gesellschaft%20M%C3%BCnchen)

**[Greek Organizations](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Greece)**  
 [Greek Font Society](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Greek%20Font%20Society)

**[Italian Organizations](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Italy)**  
 [AIAP](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/AIAP)

**[Japanese Organizations](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Japan)**  
 [Tokyo TDC](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tokyo%20TDC)

**[Brazilian Organizations](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Brazil)**  
 [ADG Brazil](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ADG%20Brazil)

**[Portuguese Organizations](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Portugal)**  
 [Centro Português de Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Centro%20Portugues%20de%20Design) (CPD)

**[Turkish Organizations](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Turkey)**  
 [Turkish Typography Society](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Turkish%20Typography%20Society) (TTT) ( [turkcetipografitoplulugu.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/www.turkcetipografitoplulugu.org/))

**Discussion:**  
 [Typographic Trade Organizations?](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123910/http:/typophile.com/node/29249)
author: James Grieshaber
